document_data.mainbody: '''Malveen''' family of [[Selgaunt]] is a noble one, albeit not a very powerful one since [[Velanna Malveen]] was discovered to be a pirate.{{Cite dragon/289/Rogues Gallery: The Foes of Stormweather, Part 2}}
